name: Auto Bot
short_description:
NOTICE: We're not on SourceForge anymore. See http://autoproj.org for our new domain.

Auto is modern, simple, and smart automated bot software, designed per a philosophy of minimalism, simplicity, usability, cleanliness, and easy extensibility.

It has support for IRC (v3.1) with planned support for XMPP.

It can be easily extended by means of its plugin API, and offers a host of features. It is known to function on any OS on which Ruby 1.9 functions (such as Linux, Mac OS X, BSD, Microsoft Windows, etc.).
summary: A modern, minimalist, extensible chat bot.
